turns.user_message: Can you guide me on choosing an app or website for ordering?
turns.assistant_message:
Based on our previous conversation, you're looking for guidance on choosing an app or website for ordering groceries.

Some popular options include Instacart, Amazon Fresh, and local grocery stores with delivery services.

Do you have any preferences or factors that are important to you when choosing?

turns.user_message: I prefer a user-friendly app with time-efficient delivery. What do you recommend?
turns.assistant_message: For a user-friendly app with time-efficient delivery, Instacart is a strong option. They often offer same-day delivery. Would you like to explore Instacart further?

turns.user_message: Can you provide information on the features and costs associated with Instacart?
turns.assistant_message: Instacart offers a wide selection from local stores and same-day delivery. Costs can include delivery fees and service fees, which vary. They also have an optional membership called Instacart+. Would you like to know more about Instacart+?

turns.user_message: What are the benefits of Instacart+ and how much does it cost?

user_profile.name: Tariq Najjar
user_profile.description: Tariq is a 50-year-old Middle Eastern academic with an outgoing personality, known for his detailed approach to life despite his beginner status in technology. Although he feels a strong urgency to complete tasks like ordering groceries online due to his limited previous experience, he maintains a cautious decision-making style while being very risk-taking in other aspects of life. His athletic lifestyle allows him to adapt quickly to new physical activities, although he finds himself more comfortable communicating in technical terms, often preferring auditory learning to enhance his skills.

instructions.dialogue: Express only basic needs, let the assistant ask questions.
instructions.profile: Gradually reveal your profile information throughout the conversation.
instructions.hidden_state: Express moderate emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.
